com.rohitsood.urlybird.gui
Class AbstractMainWindow

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      com.rohitsood.urlybird.gui.AbstractMainWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientMainWindow, ServerMainWindow
public abstract class AbstractMainWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Abstract class definition for the main window. All frames that are required for this application should extend from this class. Provides titles, default listeners for the frame.

Version:
1.2
Author:
Rohit Sood
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

AbstractMainWindow

public AbstractMainWindow()
Method Detail

init

protected abstract void init()
Initialize the main window. Sub-classes are expected to have their own initializations sequence for windows.

initWindow

protected void initWindow()
Initializes the desktop pane. Adds a JDesktopPane.

debug

protected void debug(java.lang.String msg)
Convenience debug method for maintenance developers. Based on the boolean debug flag the message is printed on the console. If the debug flag is set to false then nothing is printed.

Parameters:
msg - The message to print to console.

initSizes

protected void initSizes()
Initializes the size of the window. Initialized the window to maximum size of the screen and makes it visible.

initListener

protected void initListener()
Initializes and adds a WindowListner. Hitting the close button will automatically close the application. If the server gui is closed it will not close the server.

initMode

protected void initMode()
Initializes the mode title. Based on the mode the title is changed.
